name: RetroLib: KiCad Library for 6502-related retro microchips
description: KiCad Symbol Library for 6502 and related retro microchips
description_full:
You may need to manually update the library tables in the Library Manager to get the new symbols and footprints to show up: please refer to the GitHub link below for full documentation and installation instructions.

This is a library of KiCad schematic symbols for a variety of Commodore, MOS Technology and Western Design Center retro microchips, including the eponymous MOS Technologies 6502.
